titles.title: A resolution to provide for the appointment of a committee to receive and to report evidence with respect to articles of impeachment against Judge Samuel B. Kent.
A resolution to provide for the appointment of a committee to receive and to report evidence with respect to articles of impeachment against Judge Samuel B. Kent.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: Requires the Presiding Officer of the Senate to appoint a committee of 12 Senators to receive and to report evidence with respect to articles of impeachment against Judge Samuel B. Kent.
